name: forgejo
description: Forgejo is a lightweight, self-hosted Git forge forked from Gitea. It enables code hosting, issues, CI, and container registry support with a familiar web interface and a focus on community-driven governance.
features: Git Hosting: Self-hosted Git forge, Issues and pull requests, CI/CD support. Complete code collaboration platform.
Container Registry: Built-in package hosting. Integrated workflows.
Lightweight: Fast and efficient. Minimal resources.
Community-Driven: Open governance model. Transparent development.
Gitea Fork: Familiar interface. Easy migration.
Actions: Built-in CI/CD pipelines. Automated workflows.
Webhooks: Integrate with external tools. Extensible platform.
